segments.text: Can I help you?
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yes, I'm um- just getting my I.D.  I need a new I.D.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Oh, this- this form that you have is the wrong form.  You need to go over to the other line on the other side of the D.M.V..
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What do you mean?  I filled out my forms and I rushed to get my I.D.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Right, but this is the wrong form.  Somebody gave you the wrong form.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: The wrong form?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Yeah.  So, I can't -- I can't do anything-
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What's wrong about this form?  It says new I.D. on it.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: No, but this is for um- replacements and you need a new -- whole new license as a California --
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: What's the difference?  What's the difference between that form and this form?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Sir, don't get an attitude with me.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I'm not getting a -- well, you wait in this line and not get an attitude.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: No, I understand and there are a lot of people here.  But what I'm telling you is that it's different for different states and since your getting a new license in the state of California -- You have to fill out a different form than you did.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: yeah.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: right.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Well then, when I showed them my I.D. before and I said I had to get a new I.D, why didn't they tell me to fill out the right form?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I don't know.  I don't know who told you.  It wasn't me.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Well, it was this girl standing right next to you.  Can we ask her why she didn't let me fill out the right form?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: You- You can ask her if you want, but she's busy and she probably won't answer you.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: This is ridiculous.  I've been here for forty five minutes. Just standing in this one line. I took fifteen minutes to fill out that form.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I know.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Sir, you- I mean
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Do you know how long it's gonna take me to start all over and fill out the new form?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: You can waist as much as you want
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Yeah.  I know it's gonna take a minute.  But you-- so you might as well get started now.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Might as well get started now? but Just take this one.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I can't take this one, sir. this is the wrong form.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Why can't we just -- you know what?  How about if we just pretend that I'm getting a -- renewing my California I.D. and we just don't tell anybody -- That I'm getting a new one from a different state?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Sir, please don't waste my time.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: There is nothing I can do about it.  You need to take this other form and fill it out and go stand in the other line.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Come on!  You know -- you can't just take -- make a little exception to the rule?  I know that you guys make exceptions.  I see -- you know, if I was-if I was your friend and you knew me, or something like that, you'd probably make a little exception for me wouldn't you?
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: They're different forms, we process them all different-
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Wouldn't you? Oh, come on.  you just tell me.  You would make an exception for me.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I -- there's no way I'd make an exception.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Sir, don't patronize me.  I can't make an exception.  I don't- I don't have the power to do that.  It's a different form.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Shh...I know you've got the power to do that.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: They're processed differently.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: That's crap- You're crap.  I don't buy it.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: Sir, you're gonna have to go stand in the other line.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: I'm not leaving this line until I get my new I.D.  That's as simple as it is.  I'm not leaving this line until I get my new I.D.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: I'm gonna- I'm gonna bring security over and have them escort you out.
segments.speaker: F

segments.text: Well, then you're just gonna look stupid because I'm just waiting for an I.D. and you're gonna make security take me out because I want my I.D.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: That's just dumb.
segments.speaker: M

segments.text: But you filled out the wrong form and you're in the wrong line and you're wasting both of our times.
